question: Consider the following about The Right to Disconnect Bill 2018(private Member's bill). 1. It provides right to not respond to calls or any kind of communications from the employers after office hours. 2. A private bill has an expectancy of 6 years to be discussed, before lapse. Which of the above is true?
explanation: NCP MP Supriya Sule has introduced the Right to Disconnect Bill 2018.It is a Private Memberâ€™s Bill, in the Lok Sabha. A private bill has an expectancy of 6 years to be discussed, before lapse.
